title: danijess
author: danijess
content: Hello Bitcoin Talk Community,We're excited to present Capapult, a groundbreaking DeFi platform on the Terra blockchain, integrated with our unique stablecoin, Solid. Capapult is more than just a platform; it’s a paradigm shift in DeFi, designed for stability, community-driven profitability, and ease of use.**Key Features of Capapult and Solid:**- **Innovative Solid Stablecoin Model:** Solid, our stablecoin, stands at the forefront of our ecosystem. When you borrow Solid using crypto collaterals, we apply a variable fee instead of interest. This fee is dynamically adjusted based on Solid's peg to ensure fairness and stability for all users.- **Empowering Governance with CAPA:** CAPA, our governance token, not only lets holders steer the ecosystem but also enables them to share in the protocol's profits. This aligns the interests of our community with the platform's success.- **User-Centric Enhancements:** Our web app is getting major upgrades for a smoother experience. We're integrating a liquidation price feature for Solid, and revamping the interface to make navigating our platform easier and more intuitive.- **Interchain Ambitions:** Capapult is set to extend beyond the Terra ecosystem, embracing interchain functionality for a more inclusive DeFi experience.- **Astroport Incentives and Liquidity:** Dive into DeFi by trading CAPA and Solid on Astroport. We're also introducing Astro incentives for our liquidity pools to reward active community participation.**Getting Started with Capapult:**- **Trade CAPA and Solid:** Begin your DeFi journey by acquiring CAPA and Solid on  https://app.astroport.fi/swap?to=terra1t4p3u8khpd7f8qzurwyafxt648dya6mp6vur3vaapswt6m24gkuqrfdhar&from=ibc/B3504E092456BA618CC28AC671A71FB08C6CA0FD0BE7C8A5B5A3E2DD933CC9E4. Join us in fostering a robust liquidity pool.- **Stay Informed:** Check out CAPA’s market dynamics and updates on Coingecko  https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/capapult- **Explore Capapult App:** For a direct experience with our features, visit the [Capapult App] https://app.capapult.finance/dashboard**Join Our Growing Community:**Keep up with the latest updates and connect with fellow members in our [Telegram group] https://t.me/CapapultTG, available through our Twitter profile.**Capapult: Your Gateway to Advanced DeFi:**Join us in shaping a future where DeFi is not just decentralized but also intuitive, profitable, and community-oriented. Your support, feedback, and engagement are vital in driving Capapult towards new horizons in DeFi.Thank you for being a part of our exciting journey. We welcome your questions and look forward to your active participation.Thanks!Daniel
